subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Miller made 27 saves and Tim Connolly scored at 2 minutes 31 seconds of overtime to help lead the Sabres past the Flyers and into first place in the Northeast Division.
snippet: Ryan Miller made 27 saves and Tim Connolly scored at 2 minutes 31 seconds of overtime to help lead the Sabres past the Flyers and into first place in the Northeast Division.
